div.p:
1、 办理业务前，请留意查看自助设备插卡口、出钞口、键盘及机器其它部位是否加装或粘贴异物，注意周围是否有可疑人员。
2、切勿轻信手机短信中银行卡交易或中奖等信息，切勿拨打粘贴在自助设备上除95599外的任何联系电话，警惕不发分子利用自助设备进行诈骗。
3、输入密码时应快速并尽量用手遮挡，以防不法分子窥视。请不要向他人透漏您的密码。
4、在交易过程中请不要离开自助设备，尽量避免他人吸引注意力。交易完成后，应及时退出系统并取回银行卡。
5、办理业务时，如果设备吞卡或未吐钞，请尽快联系营业机构人员或拨打95599客户服务电话。

1.Before the transaction,please check the card slot,cash slot,keyboard and other parts of the ATM carefully to see if there is any
unidentified object installed or taped on the machine,or any suspicious persons around you.
2.Please be vigilant against text messages on transactions or award wining and never call the contact numbers taped on the machine
except for the Customer Service 95599 to avoid fraud.
3.Please enter the password quickly,better to be covered by your hand,to avoid peeks of intentional lawbreakers.Please do not tell
your password to the others.
4.During the transaction,please do not leave the machine and avoid attracting attentions of other persons.After the transaction,
please exit the system and withdraw your card as soon as possible.
5.During the transact business,if the card or cash is retained by the machine,please contact the staff of the outlet or call the Customer
Service 95599 immediately.
